item.title: About Othmane Rifki
item.description: I am a former particle physicist turned machine learning scientist. This is my journey! Email: othrif@gmail.com Twitter: @OthmaneRifki Selected Experience Principal Applied Scientist, Spectrum Labs, Oct 2020 - Present Postdoctoral Fellow, DESY, Oct 2017 - Sep 2020 Selected Projects Website Notes, othrif.github.io, April 2020 - Present Education PhD., Particle Physics, University of Oklahoma, Norman, OK. 2017 Thesis: Search for supersymmetry with the ATLAS detector at the LHC arXiv:1712.
